post.title: fs: fido $50 unlimited data plan
post.content: i am looking to part with my unlimited data plan for $57 per month with the netowk access fee. it has much value to me but i need to find ways to make cash quick here. i am offering it for $4500 cad with a novatel wireless mc950d hsupa modem. pm me for details or email me at unlimited.gpunl@gmail.com
